briefdescription.para: Gets the attribute handle of a report given the type and id.

parameterdescription.para: The type of report (HID_REPORT_TYPE_INPUT, HID_REPORT_TYPE_OUTPUT, HID_REPORT_TYPE_FEATURE)

simplesect.para: The attribute handle for the report or ATT_HANDLE_NONE if the report is not in the map.

briefdescription.para: Gets the type and ID of a report given a handle.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the hidReportIdMap_t with the type and ID

briefdescription.para: Gets the HID control point value.

simplesect.para: The control point value (HID_CONTROL_POINT_SUSPEND or HID_CONTROL_POINT_RESUME).

briefdescription.para: Gets the HID protocol mode value.

simplesect.para: The protocol mode value (HID_PROTOCOL_MODE_REPORT or HID_PROTOCOL_MODE_BOOT).

briefdescription.para: Sets the HID protocol mode for keyboard and mouse devices that support Boot Mode.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint8_t reportId, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue)
memberdef.name: HidSendInputReport

briefdescription.para: Sends an input report to the host.

parameterdescription.para: The length of the report in bytes

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t operation, uint16_t offset, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pValue, attsAttr_t *pAttr)
memberdef.name: HidAttsWriteCback

briefdescription.para: Called on an ATTS Write to the HID Service.
